## About us

The McLab Field Pathology & Epidemiology Group focuses on plant disease epidemiology, field pathology and disease management within South African cropping systems. We work at the interface of field trials, diagnostics, modelling and producer-focused extension.

[Read more about our background, vision and mission »](about.qmd)

## What we do

-   Field pathology and epidemiology across major crops and regions\
-   Disease forecasting and modelling to support timely management decisions\
-   Producer-focused extension and training, grounded in research\
-   Student development, supervision and mentoring in field pathology
